description:
The Splunk Universal Forwarder is a component of Splunk to collect data on machine and forward it to an indexer.
	
	It's a good idea to specify either a RECEIVING_INDEXER or DEPLOYMENT_SERVER. You might do something like:
	choco install splunkforwarder --params="RECEIVING_INDEXER=somehost:9997"
	
	Details about all the parameters are at the Splunk docs:	
	http://docs.splunk.com/Documentation/Splunk/6.2.3/Forwarding/DeployaWindowsdfviathecommandline
	
	The GitHub home for this package is: https://github.com/tnwinc/chocolatey-splunkforwarder
author: Splunk,  Inc
